snippet: Pressured by federal safety regulators, Honda is adding more than one million vehicles to a growing recall for airbags that can violently explode.
abstract: Honda announces that it will add more than one million vehicles to recall regarding exploding airbags.
lead_paragraph: Pressured by federal safety regulators, Honda is adding more than one million vehicles to a growing recall for airbags that can violently explode.

headline.main: More Than a Million Vehicles Added to Honda Airbag Recall
headline.print_headline: More Than a Million Vehicles Added to Honda Airbag Recall
